body.name: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Shape Effect Tummy Hold High Rise Boot Cut Jean
features: Fabric type 59% Cotton, 28% Polyester, 12% Viscose, 1% Spandex
STYLE - Beloved boot jean with tummy control panels, back pocket embroidery, zipper fly, belt loops and five functional pockets on a bootcut leg.
VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashion forward to a novelty tee and all footwear from trendy shoes to your favorite flats.
LENGTH - This stylish stretch bootcut comes in a 32 inch inseam fron crotch to hem with a 18 inch leg opening
Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
body.description: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Apparel; Shape effect tummy control boot cut jean gives you that wear confidence we all want whether your top is tucked in or not. The high rise waist sits at natural waistline with an easy to use front zipper fly and five fully functional pockets so you can run around with or without a handbag. This bootcut jean will go great with all your tops from fashion forward to a basic tee shirt as well as all footwear from strappy sandals and trendy heels to your favorite flats or boots. Available in assorted washes, see color name for specifics. - Goria Vanderbilt, Effortlessly fun and stylish. A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Gloria Vanderbilt, well-known for the Amanda Jean; America’s original slimming jean, has stood the test of time as one of the largest denim brands in North America. Today the brand encompasses a wide range of fits with quality fabrics, updated washes and fashionable details. Gloria Vanderbilt; long known for its best in class fit, has now expanded beyond their well-loved denim and colored bottoms to include: jackets, knits and woven tops to bring you effortless fun and style. Gloria Vanderbilt: America’s Original Designer Jean The brand started in 1976 between Gloria Vanderbilt and designer Mohan Murjani. Known for its fit, signature Gloria Vanderbilt embroidery and swan logo Our Brand's Most Famous Style To Date: Amanda Classic Tapered Jean - The original slimming jean. It seems to instantly flatten your tummy, creating flawless curves. Designed to sit perfectly at natural waist line, eliminating any unsightly muffin tops. Our jeans run from 4 to 18 in Missy, 4P to 16P in Petite and 14W to 24W in Plus size with some styles offered also in short and long length to suit all body types at any age.

Amanda Classic Curvy Skinny Amanda Boot Cut Amanda Button Down Shirt Shape Effect Pull On Straight Avery Pull On Style: The Original Fit Solution Jean that seems to flatten your tummy, creating flawless curves and eliminating any unsightly muffin tops Great Shaped Motion Flex Skinny; engineered with secret slimming panels in stretch denim with amazing recovery to look as fabulous as you’ll feel Sculpt stretch premium denim leg-lengthening boot cut style flatters every body type and may help you feel inches taller with or without the heels Button front shirt that can easily be dressed up or worn casually with Swan Monogram . Confidence in Full Effect; with a Pull on style with hidden elastic waist and comfortable stretch that covers allover. Contour Ultra Flex Pull On sculpting you to look your very best from every angle. Get the look of a jean with the comfortable ease of a pull on Description: Classic fit tapered leg, sits at natural waist, zipper fly and belt loops. Offered in Missy Sizes, Petite Sizes and Plus Sizes Contoured from hips to hemline, Mid Rise sits slightly below waistline, Functional five pocket styling, Zipper fly and belt loops. Offered in Missy Sizes and Petite Sizes Sits at natural waist, zipper fly and belt loops, slim through hips and thighs for a more modernized boot cut body, slimming silhouette and wide leg opening. Offered in Missy Sizes and Plus Sizes Classy feminine cut button up front shirt with tab roll sleeves, collar neck and side slits with high low curved hem. Comfort waist pull on jean sits at natural waist providing the coverage and flexability you want in a slim straight body Comfortable waistband sits slightly below natural waistline, Slim fit throughout from hips to ankles, Faux fly. Offered in Missy Sizes Front Rise: 11 1/4 " 9 3/4 " 11 1/4 " 11 1/4 " 10 1/2 " Average Length: 31 " 30 " 32 " 29 " frt / 30.5 " bk 30 " 30 " Multiple Lengths: ✓ ✓ ✓ Petite / Plus Sizes: ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓
Gloria Vanderbilt - A versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages
